only.group: 👩‍👩‍👦‍👦 ```This command can only be used in groups!```
only.ownerG: 💎 ```This command can only be used by the owner of the group!```
only.ownerB: 🎩 ```This command can only be used by the owner of the bot!```
only.modB: 👮 ```This command can only be used by the moderators of the bot!```
